item.title: How can i?
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

so put 995 like 20 times then d full helm id once…in item2.java

That means theres a 19 out of 20 chance of getting coins and 1 out of 20 chance of getting d full helm. Do what he said and then do what I said or put other items in place of coins

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @w00dscape w00dscape

@w00dscape wrote:

no i want it so drops like d full helm will be rare(very)

item.title: How can i?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Add the NPC you want to Autospawn.CFG and make its name to whatever you wish.

Next in item2.JAVA (if you have it) change one of the NPC’s already there E.G skeleton to the name you gave the NPC in autospawn.CFG then you change the tiem ID’s you whatever you want it to drop.

To make it 100% that it drops one item only put that item ID in once, therefore it only drops THAT certain item.

Read full topic
